STUDIOMATES AT

Aurora Gallery

Rachel Binagia

Rachel designs jewelry for her own jewelry line, People like Shine. She also creates colorful abstract acrylic paintings, mixed media/digital art and custom pet portraits. Her jewelry and art can be found at the Aurora Gallery, First Saturday Arts Market, and online.

GO SHINY

Heather J. Taylor

Heather works as an artist primarily in watercolor and her art can be found at Aurora Gallery in The Heights, The Tinderbox in Midtown, Across the Tracks Gallery in Livingston, TX and soon her work will be available in Austin. She is a member of the Watercolor Art Society of Houston.

Studio 11

Where the magic happens.

Our studio is located at 129 Aurora Street. There are shows every third Saturday of the month from 6pm-9pm. Stop by to say hi, drink some wine and buy some art!
